metadataAttributes.Title: Healthy and Sustainable Foods and Products Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Assess Sustainability & Health of Foods & Products. This course series provides you the concepts, quantitative metrics, data and tools, to define, assess and improve the health and sustainable performances of foods and products over their entire life cycle
metadataAttributes.Skills: Problem Solving, Performance, disease, Flow Network, Environmental Impact Assessment, Sustainability, Environmental Health, Diets, Motivation,
